  • Method Details

    • connectToServer

      public void connectToServer()
      connectToServer() This method initiates the connection to Server

    • updateViewModel

      public void updateViewModel()
      updateViewModel() This method is called at the end of every ReadThread method which implements the Server-Client communication protocol messages, by calling the updateViewModels method of the DataModelManager These methods of ReadThread manipulate the Data of the DataModelManager. Therefore after the manipulation the ConnectionViewModel has to fetch the updates. This is realized with the updateViewModel method.

    • deleteError

      public void deleteError()
      deleteError() This method resets the error Message by resetting the chat History. At this stage of the app the only value of the chat History can be an error Message, therefore this action is valid.
